javax.servlet.sip

Interface SessionKeepAlive.Preference

  • Enclosing interface:
    SessionKeepAlive

    public static interface SessionKeepAlive.Preference
    Holds the preference data in the SIP message headers.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getEnabled()
      Return whether session keep alive is enabled or not.
      int getExpiration()
      Return the session expiration in seconds.

      Return Minimum expiration time in seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • setRefresher

        void setRefresher(SessionKeepAlive.Refresher refresher)
        Set the refresher type. This maps to the refresher parameter in Session-Expires header.
        Parameters:
        refresher - Type of the refresher.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument conflicts with the rules specified by RFC 4028.
        IllegalStateException - If session keep alive is not enabled.

      • getRefresher

        SessionKeepAlive.Refresher getRefresher()
        Return the type of the refresher. This maps to the refresher parameter in Session-Expires header.
        Returns:
        Type of refresher.

      • setMinimumExpiration

        void setMinimumExpiration(int minSE)
        Minimum expiration possible. This maps to Min-SE header.
        Parameters:
        minSE - Minimim session expiration time in seconds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument conflicts with the rules specified by RFC 4028.
        IllegalStateException - If session keep alive is not enabled.

      • getMinimumExpiration

        int getMinimumExpiration()
        Return Minimum expiration time in seconds. This maps to Min-SE header.
        Returns:
        Minimum expiration time.

      • setExpiration

        void setExpiration(int expiration)
        Set the session expiration. This maps to Session-Expires header.
        Parameters:
        expiration - Session expiration in seconds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument conflicts with the rules specified by RFC 4028.
        IllegalStateException - If session keep alive is not enabled.

      • getExpiration

        int getExpiration()
        Return the session expiration in seconds. This maps to Session-Expires header.
        Returns:
        Session expiration in seconds.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether the session keep-alive is enabled or not. Indicate that the session keep alive is enabled. The container make sure that necessary headers to indicate that the servlet supports session timer. It updates or insert session timer related headers as specified in RFC 4028 for UAC, proxy and UAS.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Set the enabled flag.

      • getEnabled

        boolean getEnabled()
        Return whether session keep alive is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        True if the session keep alive is enabled, false otherwise.
